description: This water-resistant hooded jacket is built to keep you warmer than ever. Their most advanced thermal-reflective lining keeps warmth in, blocks cold, and stays breathable. Find function with zippered chest and hand pockets, snug binding at the hood, and an adjustable hem.
name: Columbia Sportswear Arch Rock Double Wall Elite Hooded Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 80g Microtemp XF II 85% Recycled Polyester, 15% Polyester
